oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Marriage License of Preston Taylor and Georgia Gordon
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Preston Taylor, a businessman and minister, was one of Nashville's most powerful black leaders. His wife, Georgia Gordon Taylor, was one of the original Fisk Jubilee Singers. Georgia was among the first group of singers to tour Europe when the Jubilee Singers appeared before Queen Victoria. 5 x 7 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Taylor, Preston; Gordon, Georgia M.
Davidson County (Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Metropolitan Nashville/Davidson County Archives, Nashville Public Library
